column4: Ok, there a way to burn an image when your booted from Live CD 5.10?  because when I eject the cd I get errors
This is going to be a pain in my rear if I have to reinstall windows
could see if theres a 'toram' option when you first boot up. You will need a lot of ram however.
install kubuntu-desktop, then on the login screen theres a menu you select which one to use
